abstract: In the Amazon book delisting debacle, Twitter spread news and misinformation with equal efficiency.
snippet: In the Amazon book delisting debacle, Twitter spread news and misinformation with equal efficiency.
lead_paragraph: The Twitterati have long marveled at how effective the microblogging service is at spreading the news, 140 characters at a time. The crash of a US Airways Airbus in the Hudson River in January is Exhibit 1, but there are many other examples.
